column4: hi i have a question i have installed firestarter to share an internet connection and the DHCP server is not starting at the start up of the computer what is the command to add the DHCP at the start up\??
may i have an answer at the post that i made before
there is a bug related to DHCP and firestarter. Let me look it up...
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firestarter/+bug/48006 -- have a look at the discussion.
